summary: The 2023 AFL Grand Final was a thrilling Australian rules football match between Collingwood and Brisbane Lions at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. Held on September 30, it decided the premier for the 2023 AFL season. A packed crowd of over 100,000 watched Collingwood win by just four points, claiming their 16th premiership. Collingwood's Bobby Hill played the best and won the Norm Smith Medal. This win tied Collingwood's record with Carlton and Essendon for the most VFL/AFL premierships.
title: 2023 AFL Grand Final
